localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
blogPost.body: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
blogPost.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
blogPost.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

localize.description: Avo通过一个指导性的工作流程，捕捉错误并在现有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之间同步，将繁忙的工作从分析中解放出来。对于那些厌倦了花更多的时间来管理数据而不是建立伟大的产品的人来说。
Avo通過一個指導性的工作流程，捕捉錯誤並在現有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之間同步，將繁忙的工作從分析中解放出來。對於那些厭倦了花更多的時間來管理數據而不是建立偉大的產品的人來說。

previous.excerpt: Kafkai is a machine-learning algorithm writes articles from scratch. There is no scraping or spinning happening in the background. It allows you to get unique content for cents instead of dollars. It's perfect for bulk content production that SEOs require.
previous.title: Kafkai 2.0 - Unique and readable content generated by AI

localize.description: Kafkai是一个机器学习算法从头开始写文章。后台没有发生任何刮擦或旋转。它允许你以美分而不是美元的价格获得独特的内容。它非常适合SEO所需要的批量内容生产。
localize.tagline: 由人工智能产生的独特和可读的内容

localize.description: Kafkai是一個機器學習算法從頭開始寫文章。後臺沒有發生任何刮擦或旋轉。它允許你以美分而不是美元的價格獲得獨特的內容。它非常適合SEO所需要的批量內容生產。
localize.tagline: 由人工智能產生的獨特和可讀的內容

next.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate investment analysis tool, which helps you to find and to analyze the best investment opportunities nearby.
next.title: DataMool - Predictive property investment opportunities. Worldwide.

localize.description: DataMool是一款预测性的住宅房地产投资分析工具，它可以帮助您找到并分析附近的最佳投资机会。
localize.tagline: 预测房产投资机会。全球范围内。

localize.description: DataMool是一款預測性的住宅房地產投資分析工具，它可以幫助您找到並分析附近的最佳投資機會。
localize.tagline: 預測房產投資機會。全球範圍內。
